metadata.title: Supplementary data to A new oxygen modification cyclooctaoxygen binds to nucleic acids as sodium crown complex

body_text.text: * The mass error (ppm) was calculated according to [1] . * The time between addition of the 0.694 M Na + -acetate buffer (pH 6.36) and the addition of the last reagent. † The pH value of the assay solution after addition of the last reagent. ‡ Detected visually following 10 s moderate shaking of the catalase effect assay 5 ml glass vessel after addition of the last reagent (gas evolution intensity rating: ─, no significant gas evolution; +, moderate gas evolution without frothing; ++, moderate to strong gas evolution accompanied by weak frothing; +++, strong gas evolution accompanied by frothing). measure of goodness-of-fit) on EC 50 and EC 90 . AZT, zidovudine (3'-azido-3'-deoxythymidine).
FTC, emtricitabine (2',3'-dideoxy-5-fluoro-3'-thia-β-L-cytidine). N.D., not determined (because not calculable).
* The given effective inhibitory concentrations (µM ± s.d.) for the positive control AZT were averaged and treated statistically from nineteen (n = 19) independent determinations. † Taken from [2] .
Cytotoxicity CC 50 (µM) and cellular growth at fixed 100 µM concentration (%, in parentheses)

BIBREF0.title: →5')-uridylic acid 2',3'-cyclic phosphate] 2 . [5'-HO-GpU>p ≡ p<CpA-OH-5'], nonpalindromic double stranded dinucleotide 2

BIBREF1.title: SI 50 , selectivity index CC 50 /EC 50 . SI 90 , selectivity index CC 50 /EC 90 . Neutral red, test for lysosomal uptake of 3-amino-7-(dimethylamino)-2-methylphenazine hydrochloride (neutral red vital stain). VYR, virus yield reduction plaque assay of actual virus yield. RIB, ribavirin (1-β-D-ribofuranosyl-1H-1,2,4-triazole-3-carboxamide)
BIBREF1.venue: CC 50 , cytotoxic concentration 50%. EC 50 , effective inhibitory concentration 50%. EC 90 , effective inhibitory concentration 90%

FIGREF1.text: Proton magnetic resonance spectroscopy of cytidine hydrochloride and NC recorded in deuterated dimethyl sulfoxide. (A) The 700.43 MHz 1 H-NMR spectrum of cytidine × HCl dissolved in DMSO-d 6 , together with the atom numbering scheme of cytidine × HCl (valid for 2'deoxycytidine × HCl, too). (B) The 700.43 MHz 1 H-NMR spectrum of NC dissolved in DMSO-d 6 .

FIGREF2.text: Fourier transform infrared (FT-IR) spectroscopy of cytidine hydrochloride and NC. (A) The FT-IR spectrum of cytidine × HCl recorded in KBr pellet. (B) The FT-IR spectrum of NC recorded in KBr pellet.

FIGREF3.text: Fourier transform Raman (FT-Raman) spectroscopy of cytidine hydrochloride and NC. (A) The FT-Raman spectrum of cytidine × HCl recorded with neat crystalline solid. (B) The FT-Raman spectrum of NC recorded with neat crystalline solid.

FIGREF4.text: Electrospray ionization mass spectrometry (ESI-MS) of NC and dNC. (A) The ESI-MS spectrum of NC dissolved in aqueous methanol (1.2 mg/ml). (B) The magnified (5 ×) ESI-MS spectrum of dNC dissolved in methanol (1.9 mg/ml).

FIGREF5.text: Electrospray ionization mass spectrometry of NC.

FIGREF6.text: Fourier transform infrared (FT-IR) spectroscopy of 2'-deoxycytidine hydrochloride and dNC. (A) The FT-IR spectrum of 2'-deoxycytidine × HCl recorded in KBr pellet. (B) The FT-IR spectrum of dNC recorded in KBr pellet.

FIGREF7.text: Electrospray ionization mass spectrometry of dNC.Fig. S8. Proton magnetic resonance spectroscopy of dNC and RC recorded in deuterated dimethyl sulfoxide. (A) The 700.43 MHz 1 H-NMR spectrum of dNC dissolved in DMSO-d 6 . (B) The 700.43 MHz 1 H-NMR spectrum of RC dissolved in DMSO-d 6 .

FIGREF8.text: Catalase effect assays of NC in absence and presence of C. utilis low-molecular weight RNA or salmon testes ssDNA.

FIGREF9.text: Fourier transform infrared (FT-IR) attenuated total reflectance (ATR) spectroscopy of cytidine hydrochloride and RC. (A) The FT-IR spectrum of cytidine × HCl recorded neat by ATR. (B) The FT-IR spectrum of RC recorded neat by ATR.

FIGREF10.text: Electrospray ionization mass spectrometry of RC.

FIGREF11.text: Thin-layer chromatographic mobility shift assay of the binding of NC to C. utilis lowmolecular weight RNA. (1) Cytidine × HCl, incubation at RT for 3 h 15 min, 40 µl solution on spot. (2) NC, incubation at RT for 3 h 15 min, 40 µl solution on spot. (3) C. utilis RNA, incubation of the C. utilis low-molecular weight RNA stock suspension at RT for 3 h 15 min, 80 µl colloidal solution on spot. (4) C. utilis RNA + NC, 1,000 µl C. utilis low-molecular weight RNA colloidal stock solution added to 500 µl of NC stock solution, incubation at RT for 3 h, 80 µl colloidal solution on spot. (5) C. utilis RNA + cytidine × HCl, 1,000 µl C. utilis low-molecular weight RNA colloidal stock solution added to 500 µl of cytidine × HCl stock solution, incubation at RT for 3 h, 80 µl colloidal solution on spot. RNase A, paired (including two palindromic sequences) and unpaired RNA dinucleotides representing human skin RNase A (RNase 7)-produced enzymatic degradation products of C. utilis tRNA and C. utilis 5S rRNA. 5'-HO-ApC>p, adenosinyl(3'→5')cytidylic acid 2',3'-cyclic phosphate. 5'-HO-GpC>p, guanosinyl(3'→5')-cytidylic acid 2',3'-cyclic phosphate. 5'-HO-ApU>p, adenosinyl(3'→5')-uridylic acid 2',3'-cyclic phosphate. 5'-HO-GpU>p, guanosinyl(3'→5')-uridylic acid 2',3'-cyclic phosphate. [5'-HO-GpC>p] 2 , palindromic [guanosinyl(3'→5')-cytidylic acid 2',3'-cyclic phosphate] 2 . [5'-HO-ApU>p] 2 , palindromic

FIGREF12.text: Thin-layer chromatographic mobility shift assay of the binding of NC to salmon testes ssDNA (sonicated salmon testes genomic DNA). (1) Cytidine × HCl, incubation at RT for 1 h 15 min, 40 µl solution on spot. (2) NC, incubation at RT for 1 h 15 min, 40 µl solution on spot. (3) Salmon testes ssDNA, 100 µl salmon testes ssDNA colloidal stock solution diluted with 300 µl H 2 O, incubation at RT for 55 min, 80 µl colloidal solution on spot. (4) Salmon testes ssDNA + NC, 700 µl salmon testes ssDNA colloidal stock solution added to 500 µl of NC stock solution, incubation at RT for 1 h, 80 µl colloidal solution on spot. (5) Salmon testes ssDNA + cytidine × HCl, 200 µl salmon testes ssDNA colloidal stock solution added to 500 µl of cytidine × HCl stock solution, incubation at RT for 1 h, 80 µl colloidal solution on spot.

FIGREF13.text: Thin-layer chromatographic mobility shift assay of the binding of NC to salmon testes ssDNA (sonicated salmon testes genomic DNA) in absence and presence of spermine × 1 ⅓ (sodium dihydrogen phosphate) × 9 H 2 O. (1) Cytidine × HCl, incubation at RT for 1 h, 40 µl solution on spot. (2) NC, incubation at RT for 1 h, 40 µl solution on spot. (3) Salmon testes ssDNA, incubation at RT for 40 min, 40 µl colloidal salmon testes ssDNA stock solution neat on spot. (4) Salmon testes ssDNA + NC + spermine × 1 ⅓ (sodium dihydrogen phosphate) × 9 H 2 O, 200 µl freshly shaken suspension (in H 2 O) of spermine × 1 ⅓ (sodium dihydrogen phosphate) × 9 H 2 O added to 500 µl of salmon testes ssDNA + NC colloidal solution (= 5, incubated at RT for 10 min), shaking of the resulting suspension, incubation at RT for 35 min, 80 µl supernatant on spot. (5) Salmon testes ssDNA + NC, 700 µl salmon testes ssDNA colloidal stock solution added to 500 µl of NC stock solution, incubation at RT for 45 min, 80 µl colloidal solution on spot. (6) Salmon testes ssDNA + cytidine × HCl, 200 µl salmon testes ssDNA colloidal stock solution added to 500 µl of cytidine × HCl stock solution, incubation at RT for 45 min, 80 µl colloidal solution on spot. (7) Salmon testes ssDNA + cytidine × HCl + spermine × 1 ⅓ (sodium dihydrogen phosphate) × 9 H 2 O, 200 µl freshly shaken suspension (, incubation at RT for 35 min, 80 µl supernatant on spot.
